text: The Adventures of Peter Rabbit & Benjamin Bunny is a 1996 interactive children's storybook video game developed and published by Mindscape for Windows and Macintoshhttps://www.mobygames.com/game/adventures-of-peter- rabbit-benjamin-bunny in association with Beatrix Potter publisher Frederick Warne & Co. The game encourage play through interactive hotspots. Coming Soon Magazine deemed it one of the best interactive storybooks ever made. PC Mag felt it offered a "wonderful introduction" to the Peter Rabbit universe. The Advocate-Messenger praised the " magnificent watercolor quality animation". Standard Speaker noted that everything is "faithfully transferred" from the source material. == References == == External links == * https://www.chicagotribune.com/news/ct-xpm-1996-04-12-9604120386-story.html Category:1996 video games Category:Mac OS games Category:Peter Rabbit Category:Video games based on novels Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Windows games
